topic: Strategies for questioning business assumptions in the solar industry
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that there are areas of my life that I've assumed to be stable that might benefit from reevaluation. As a next step, I will set aside time this week to reflect on specific aspects of my personal and professional life that have remained unchanged for a long time, listing out assumptions I hold about them. This list will guide me to identify which areas could lead to meaningful growth or improvements if revisited.

metadata.trigger: What's a question I haven't asked myself in a while?
